::Grounded::
"Shit , i cant do anyting while he is up there...." he said to
himself....He glanced down and saw some oil leaking out from where he
was kniked by Wildrider's scatter shot..."I am clear out of ideas" he
relayed to Wind " and i am basically usless right now....can u out run
him...?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider tries to swerve up and around dodging the gun blasts.
"Dammit" he
> yells, but there are to many. They nick and graze him, puncturing small
> holes where they hit, and he soars upwards to get away. He wasnt stupid,
> even though he acted it. He was outnumbered, and needed to keep it a
one on
> one fight for now.
